name: Pool Partyyy
description: What is the project about? Pool Party is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that utilizes the Ethereum blockchain to enable users to stake and earn rewards in various liquidity Pools. The platform operates as a game that encourages users to make strategic decisions about which Pool to join, based on factors such as the annual percentage rate (APR), lock-up period, and the risk associated with each Pool. What makes your project unique? Pool Party is designed to incentivize players to stake and burn their tokens through various mechanisms, ultimately creating a deflationary token with high liquidity. History of your project. The Pool Party idea came together on March 29, 2023, and the whitepaper was published on April 4, 2023. A donation event was conducted shortly after which successfully launched the platform on April 7, 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are in the midst of launching our marketing campaign, as well, we are looking to expand the platform so we can add new DeFi games for PARTY users. What can your token be used for? The token can be used to play pool party to earn a yield on your money in perpetuity
